isis.stitle: TSI 05-04-01 - Torque Specification to Mount the Spring Applied, Air Released (SAAR) and Spring Applied, Hydraulic Released (SAHR) Brake Canisters to the Frame Rail has been Revised

subjectgroup.subject: Torque Specification to Mount the Spring Applied, Air Released (SAAR) and Spring Applied, Hydraulic Released (SAHR) Brake Canisters to the Frame Rail has been Revised

geninfo.para: The torque specification for mounting the SAAR and SAHR brake canisters to the frame rail has been revised in both production and service. The service manuals, S04044 (for SAAR) and S04048 (for SAHR), have been changed to the new specification of 55 to 60 Lbf-ft (75 to 81 Nm).
Please take note of this new torque specification when servicing the above listed models.
In addition, mark up your paper copy of Service Manuals S04044, page 11, and S04048, pages 120 and 133, with the new torque specification, 55 to 60 Lbf-ft (75 to 81 Nm).
